Calculate collection of log-probabilities for different components and samples

Source: R/util_lprobs.R
util_lprobs.Rd

Calculate collection of log-probabilities for different components and samples

Usage

util_lprobs(
  nV0,
  V0mean,
  V0sd,
  xV0,
  nV1,
  V1mean,
  V1sd,
  xV1,
  nV2,
  V2mean,
  V2sd,
  V2steps,
  xV2,
  nVN,
  VNprobs,
  xVN,
  nVB,
  VBprobs,
  xVB
)

Arguments

X

Numerical matrix: transformed variates

learnt:

Monte-Carlo-output object

nR

etc: Parameters containing appropriate indices

Value

Matrix with as many rows as components and as many cols as samples
